verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
1.Nihari mucii twetagirira guthii
Na tutingihota kuingira tuhu
Tutakuite miti itu ya kwambirwo
Na thutha turumirire muhonokia.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Yesu niaraturia tumurumirire
Notwambe twirege na tukue mitharaba
Uguo riu mundu wothe ukwenda

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Kuhono kia muoyo wake
Niaute niundu wa Mwathani
Ningi aute niundu wainjili yake. x2

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
2. O mundu ari na muoyo wa kuhonokia
No angika atia niguo akiuhonokie?
Mwendi kuhonoka taniambe we erege
Ningi akue mutharaba wakwambirwo.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
3. Ona thi yothe ingi tuika ni yaku
Ndungihota kuhonokia muoyo waku
Ungigunika ni kumitiganiria
Niundu wa Mwathani na injili yake.
